entities.name: Mundungus
entities.description: The name 'Mundungus' is mentioned as a person who decorated the house with live fairies, blocking Sirius's family tree from view. (Excerpt: 'by Mundungus and decorated with live fairies...')

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: The name 'Sirius' is mentioned as a person whose family tree was blocked from view. (Excerpt: 'blocked Sirius’s family tree from view;')

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The name 'Harry' is mentioned as the recipient of presents and books. (Excerpts: 'Harry awoke on Christmas morning...'; 'Thanks for the Broom Compass, it’s excellent...')

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: The name 'Ron' is mentioned as someone who received presents and was already opening them. (Excerpt: 'Harry awoke on Christmas morning to find a stack of presents at the foot of his bed and Ron already halfway through opening his own...')

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: The name 'Hermione' is mentioned as someone who gave Harry a homework planner. (Excerpt: 'she’s got me a homework planner —')

entities.name: Lupin
entities.description: The name 'Lupin' is mentioned as someone who, along with Sirius, gave Harry books. (Excerpt: 'Sirius and Lupin had given Harry a set of excellent books...')

relationships.description: Mundungus blocked Sirius's family tree from view. (Excerpt: 'by Mundungus and decorated with live fairies, blocked Sirius’s family tree from view;')
Harry received presents alongside Ron. (Excerpt: 'Harry awoke on Christmas morning to find a stack of presents at the foot of his bed and Ron already halfway through opening his own...')
Hermione gave Harry a homework planner. (Excerpt: 'she’s got me a homework planner —')
Sirius and Lupin gave Harry books together. (Excerpt: 'Sirius and Lupin had given Harry a set of excellent books...')
Harry received a book from Hermione. (Excerpt: 'She had given him too a book that resembled a diary...')
